journey.title: Writing a master thesis
journey.goal: Write a good master thesis at VSR

step.objective: Find new topic related to project management
step.problemStatement: There are a lot of approaches in business and project management, but there are always problems when using the different project management tools, because the don't align the employees, project goal and managers togather. Also they are very complicated to use. there are a lot of difinitions like programs, project, objectives, goals, purpose, etc ... but even expreienced managers fail sometimes in thier work, because they don't understand these concepts well or they use it in wrong way.

result.resultTitle: Well defined topic that has not been studied in VSR in the last 5 years

task.taskTitle: Ask for a list of topics that have been studied in VSR in the last 5 years.
Looking inside the different approaches in project management
Have a deep look on OKRs, defining thier pros and cons.

step.objective: create a well defined vision document
step.problemStatement: There are always missconception and misundertanding between what the student wants or sees and what professorship wants or sees, and therefore it's important that each party understands and agreeds on the same ideas to avoid any problem could appear later.

result.resultTitle: Well defined vision Doc. from 2 pages, describes the situation, the problem and the solution idea.

task.taskTitle: Describe the current situation
Describe what the current problem
describe how we are going to solve the problem

step.objective: Get a refinded Copy of vision document
step.problemStatement: Students always need to know if there vision is right or even if it's compatible with the vision of VSR.

result.resultTitle: get a signed feedback from VSR within 2 weeks

task.taskTitle: send vision doc. to vsr in email
read the vision doc. and send back feedback to the student

step.objective: Create a task describtion documnet and send it to the student
step.problemStatement: In this phase a lot of students do not know how to start or what they have actually to do, and that leads later to delay or a lot of unneeded work, therefore a task describtion document can save a lot of time and effort.

result.resultTitle: A task describtion document from x pages signed from VSR contains y,z,f...

task.taskTitle: make something in order to make this doc.
send this file to student per email.

step.objective: Get a confirmation on the task desc. doc. from student
step.problemStatement: In order to avoid problems in the future, something like the student did know what his tasks are or the student or VSR said that is not what we agreed on, signed confirmation from the student is required.

result.resultTitle: Signed confirmation from the student on the task desc. withing the next x days

task.taskTitle: Read and confirm the task desc. doc.

step.objective: Registre the Master thesis at ZPA.
step.problemStatement: The ZPA must know which thesis by whom is perforemed, many students don't know that the have deadline for thier master thesis! Sure there is a problem here which I don't know!!

result.resultTitle: Getting a confirmation and signed paper from ZPA for the master thesis.

task.taskTitle: Send the docs to ZPA
